name: The Survival 2 Island Game
description:
You have to survive on a tropical island. Start by extracting the necessary resources for survival. Wood, sticks, stones are suitable for crafting initial tools. Create a pickaxe and an ax to extract resources faster.

Create a fire to scare wild animals. Watch out for them especially at night! Take the torch in hand - it will be safer at night in the forest.

Get various ores. Stones, iron, coal are located on all islands. Explore the islands to find more resources. Climb up the high hills, climb up the mountains and explore the endless plains.

Kraft all you want. The game is a simple system for creating new items. You will be able to create your home on the island using blocks of walls, a roof, platforms made of stone or wood.

You can get a pet to help you fight off wild animals. He will be your friend.

Watch for player status indicators. Do not let a player die of hunger. Hunt, go fishing or grow fruit.
